code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Card from"../components/Card";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Projects(){const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[query,setQuery]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("/seqamlab/data/projects.json").then(res=>res.json()).then(setProjects);},[]);const filtered=projects.filter(p=>p.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||(p.description||"").toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-4",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by title or description...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full mb-6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:filtered.map((p,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:p.title,children:p.description},i))})]});}
